title: Supreme Vision Master - Novel Updates
author: Mo Yan
description:
Cultivation destroyed, eyes poisoned blind and robbed of her status in the household? 

Luo Qingtong narrows her eyes and sneers, “Bring it on! Let me teach you a lesson!” 

A 24th Century Supreme Vision Master transmigrates to become the incapacitated genius daughter of the Marquis Household in a lower-class country. 

With a pair of powerful blood-red eyes armed with the ability to appraise treasures, see through things, heal, poison and break through defenses... She is invincible! 

A spirit and martial arts cultivator, an expert in weapons and medicine, a master in controlling beasts and deploying formations... 

She is the embodiment of the ultimate supremacy and unrivaled arrogance! 

Never does she expect to get involved with a person who is even more wicked than her. From then on, it becomes a game of I-run-you-catch. When you kill someone, I’ll hand you the knife. 

Together, let’s wreak havoc in the world!>
